name: One S'More
description:
Can you help your mashmallow friend to fullfill his dream of becoming a tasty S'More?

One S'More is a challenging puzzle game, set in a tasty environment. Connect 2 chocolate biscuits and reach them with your marshmallow. 

 In order to solve the puzzle, biscuits need to be destroyed and pushed around. Every level provides you with different challenges by introducing new biscuits and cakes, but keep your distance of the dangerous swirls!

Marshmallow Movement 

 

Push away all adjacent biscuits by dropping a cake (right mouse button to cancel)

 

Break the target biscuit

Mini Map

Settings
